snippet: Gov. Jan Brewer on Tuesday signed the bill allowing health inspectors to carry out the inspections without a court-approved warrant.
abstract: Arizona Gov Jan Brewer signs bill allowing health inspectors to carry out surprise inspections on abortion clinics without having to get a court-approved warrant.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Jan Brewer on Tuesday signed the bill allowing health inspectors to carry out the inspections without a court-approved warrant.

headline.main: Arizona: Law Signed to Allow Surprise Inspections at Abortion Clinics
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Law Signed to Allow Surprise Inspections at Abortion Clinics
